page.title: 11UPPER LANGWITH DAYS.1.
page.content: Monday. Back to school at 9.00a.m. The bus people are always late. It's Maths and English,what hard work. For 3.30p.m.I just can't wait. I get home from school at 3.35, I really am hungry,I need something to eat. I go out to play until 7.00p.m. Because then on T.V. it's Coronation Street. Tuesday. On Tuesday at school we have singing. Mrs Salt says "I will play for all of you". We all try to sing in our best voices. Mr Marshall our teacher loves to sing too. Home from school,feed the rabbit. Play on the swing until teatime. For tea it's egg sandwiches, A biscuit and a drink of lime.
